      public static List<ConnectorType> extractAndValidateConnector(org.json.JSONArray jsonArray) throws org.json.JSONException, IllegalArgumentException
      Extracts and validates a list of Connector from JSON array
      Parameters:
      jsonArray - JSON array containing connector objects
      Returns:
      List of validated Connector objects
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - If array is empty or contains invalid data
      IllegalArgumentException - If any WarZonePenalty data is invalid
